product_name: SportHill Infusion Versa Pants - Women's - Special Buy
long_description: The SportHill Infusion Versa women's pants keep you comfortable while you make your way over snowy trails thanks to their warm performance fabric and comfortable, not-too-tight fit. Polyester/spandex blend fabric balances warmth, breathability and stretch; pants wick moisture and dry quickly to keep skin warm and dry in the cold. The SportHill Infusion Versa pants for women feature an extra-wide waistband that lies flat against skin for a smooth, comfortable fit. Right side panel has invisible zipper pocket on hip to store small essentials. SportHill Infusion Versa pants feature a relaxed, straight leg fit; reflective logo at back waist. Special buy.
short_description: The SportHill Infusion Versa women's pants keep you comfortable while you make your way over snowy trails thanks to their warm performance fabric and comfortable, not-too-tight fit.
